amendment.description: To grant the consent of Congress to the receipt by employees of a designated entity or designated country of Salary and benefits from such entity or country while they serve in offices or profit or trust within the Department of State.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1183 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1183 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9191-9194; text: CR S9193) To grant the consent of Congress to the receipt by employees of a designated entity or designated country of Salary and benefits from such entity or country while they serve in offices or profit or trust within the Department of State.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1183 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1183 proposed by Senator Lugar to Amendment SA 1136.
